column5: My buddy Rob smoked up our  white fish from the closer. Picked it up today. OMG  Thanks buddy. Will have to do this come the opener,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
My favourite thing to do with whitefish is to smoke them.  My second favourite thing is to smoke them and then pressure-can them. <<<DROOL>>>
Oops, no time for that,I was hungry. I was like a kid with candy. Shame the mrs,s made a roast of beast today. Oh well, I have it for Mondays dinner.
